Uses of Package
org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction

  • Packages that use org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction 
    Package Description
    org.xflatdb.xflat
    This package contains the public interface for XFlat.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.db
    This package contains the core classes for XFlat.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.engine
    This package contains the implementations of Engine that are provided by XFlat out of the box.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction
    This package contains all the classes related to the public transaction API, as well as the main TransactionManager implementations.
  • Classes in org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction used by org.xflatdb.xflat 
    Class and Description
    TransactionManager
    The TransactionManager opens transactions and manages their lifecycle.
  • Classes in org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction used by org.xflatdb.xflat.db 
    Class and Description
    Transaction
    Represents a transaction in the XFlat database.
    TransactionManager
    The TransactionManager opens transactions and manages their lifecycle.
  • Classes in org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction used by org.xflatdb.xflat.engine 
    Class and Description
    Transaction
    Represents a transaction in the XFlat database.
  • Classes in org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction used by org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction 
    Class and Description
    Isolation
    Enumerates the different transaction isolation levels supported in XFlat.
    Transaction
    Represents a transaction in the XFlat database.
    TransactionEventObject
    an EventObject for Transaction events.
    TransactionException
    The base class for all exceptions that are related to transactions.
    TransactionListener
    A Listener for Transaction Events.
    TransactionManager
    The TransactionManager opens transactions and manages their lifecycle.
    TransactionOptions
    An object representing the options that can be applied to a transaction.
